Package fr.paul_ficot.android_javamail_api_with_attachment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MediaUtils.GetImg
    Interface that will allow to exit the path to the image out of the class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Editable data
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    MailActivity
    Class of sending of mail via SMTP GMail
    MainActivity
    MailSender using JavaMail API and GMail SMTP with image attachment
    MediaUtils
    Selection class of the choice of the source of the image as well as determining the path to this image
    SendMailNoAttachment
    Send a mail without attachment The class expands AsyncTask, it will perform a networking operation.
    SendMailWithAttachment
    Send a mail without attachment The class expands AsyncTask, it will perform a networking operation.
